sn22.58:1.2: “Tathagato, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho rupassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto sammasambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:1.3: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, pannavimutto rupassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto pannavimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.1: Tathagato, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho vedanaya nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto sammasambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:2.2: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, pannavimutto vedanaya nibbida …pe… pannavimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.3: vinnanassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto sammasambuddhoti vuccati.
sn22.58:3.4: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, pannavimutto vinnanassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto pannavimuttoti vuccati.
sn22.58:4.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, ko viseso, ko adhippayaso, kim nanakaranam, tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa pannavimuttena bhikkhuna”ti?
sn22.58:4.2: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantanneva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn22.58:4.3: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn22.58:4.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn22.58:5.1: “Tathagato, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppadeta, asanjatassa maggassa sanjaneta, anakkhatassa maggassa akkhata maggannu, maggavidu, maggakovido;
sn22.58:5.2: magganuga ca, bhikkhave, etarahi savaka viharanti paccha samannagata.
sn22.58:5.3: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayam adhippayaso, idam nanakaranam tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa pannavimuttena bhikkhuna”ti.
